summary: 2001 TOYOTA SOLARA.  CAR MAKES "CLUNKING" SOUND FROM FRONT PASSENGER SIDE AND DRIVER SIDE.  USUALLY OVER BUMPS OR UNEVEN ROADS.  NOISE GETS WORSE OVER TIME.  ALREADY HAD STRUT MOUNTS REPLACED ONCE BY TOYOTA.  THE STRUT MOUNTS APPEAR TO BE THE CAUSE OF THE NOISE.   THIS NOISE IS RECOGNIZED BY TOYOTA AS SERVICE BULLETIN HOWEVER THE NOISE STILL PERSISTS.  CAR SOUNDS UNSAFE.   *NLM
